TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISnapinAbout

summary.span: 此 API 支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，但不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetProvider (out IntPtr pName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetProvider([out] native int& pName) cil managed
Public Sub GetProvider (ByRef pName As IntPtr)
public: void GetProvider([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % pName);
abstract member GetProvider : nativeint -> unit

param.name: pName
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含管理单元的提供程序名称。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the provider name of the snap-in.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

summary.span: 获取管理单元的提供程序名称。

span.span: Obtains the provider name of the snap-in.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetSnapinDescription (out IntPtr lpDescription);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSnapinDescription([out] native int& lpDescription) cil managed
Public Sub GetSnapinDescription (ByRef lpDescription As IntPtr)
public: void GetSnapinDescription([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lpDescription);
abstract member GetSnapinDescription : nativeint -> unit

param.name: lpDescription
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含用于“关于”属性页上的说明框的文本。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the text for the description box on an About property page.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

summary.span: 使控制台可以获取用于管理单元的“关于”属性页上的说明框的文本。

span.span: Allows the console to get the text for the description box on the About property page for the snap-in.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetSnapinImage (out IntPtr hAppIcon);

Public Sub GetSnapinImage (ByRef hAppIcon As IntPtr)
public: void GetSnapinImage([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hAppIcon);
abstract member GetSnapinImage : nativeint -> unit

param.name: hAppIcon
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含“关于”属性页使用的管理单元主图标的句柄。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the handle to the main icon of the snap-in used by the About property page.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

summary.span: 使控制台可以获取管理单元的“关于”属性页上使用的主图标。

span.span: Allows the console to get the main icon that is used in the About property page for a snap-in.

param.name: lpVersion
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含指定管理单元版本号的文本。

span.span: When this method returns, contains text specifying the version number for the snap-in.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

summary.span: 使控制台可以获取管理单元的版本号。

span.span: Allows the console to get the version number for the snap-in.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetStaticFolderImage (out IntPtr hSmallImage, out IntPtr hSmallImageOpen, out IntPtr hLargeImage, out int cMask);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetStaticFolderImage([out] native int& hSmallImage, [out] native int& hSmallImageOpen, [out] native int& hLargeImage, [out] int32& cMask) cil managed
Public Sub GetStaticFolderImage (ByRef hSmallImage As IntPtr, ByRef hSmallImageOpen As IntPtr, ByRef hLargeImage As IntPtr, ByRef cMask As Integer)

public: void GetStaticFolderImage([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hSmallImage, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hSmallImageOpen, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hLargeImage, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % cMask);
abstract member GetStaticFolderImage : nativeint * nativeint * nativeint * int -> unit

param.name: hSmallImage
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含范围或结果视图窗格中的小图标（16 x 16 像素）的句柄。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the handle to a small icon (16 x 16 pixels) in either the scope or results view pane.

param.name: hSmallImageOpen
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含小型打开文件夹图标（16 x 16 像素）的句柄。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the handle to a small open folder icon (16 x 16 pixels).

param.name: hLargeImage
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含大图标（32 x 32 像素）的句柄。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the handle to a large icon (32 x 32 pixels).

param.name: cMask
param.span: 此方法返回时，该结构指定生成掩码时所使用的颜色。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a structure that specifies the color used to generate a mask.

summary.span: 使控制台可以获取用于范围窗格和结果窗格的静态文件夹图像。

span.span: Allows the console to get the static folder images for the scope and results panes.
